   contain the root `toctree` directive.


Objective
---------

The objective of **Binv** is to establish a building inventory for large-scale hazard assessment and simulation studies. The Binv framework is structured as shown in the following image.

.. image:: fram.png
   :alt: Binv framework
   :align: center
   :width: 400px

The figure above shows the architecture of the proposed model. Accordingly, **Binv** is built upon three main components: **data fusion**, **feature enhancement**, and **data imputation**, with the overarching goal of ensuring both **comprehensiveness in feature representation** and **completeness in captured entities**.
